item.name: Get user passwords in the locker of vRSLCM

request.description:
https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/locker/api/passwords

Get the password assigned to a user in vRSLCM.
You will need the "vmid" of the user password you want to use, to create a new environment

https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/locker/api/certificates

You will need the "name of the certificate" and the "vmid" of the certificate you want to use to create a new environment

https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/locker/api/active/licenses

You will need the "name of the license" and the "vmid" of the "license" you want to use to create a new environment
Authorization is basic authentication
username: admin@local
password: your vRSLCM password

https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/request/api/requests/{{vmid of RequestYouWantToDelete}}
Look up the vmid of the request you want to delete from vRSLCM, first.
Authorization: Basic Authentication
username: admin@local
password: your vRSLCM password

https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/lcops/api/environments

look up all existing environments
Authorization is basic authentication
username: admin@local
password: your vRSLCM password

item.name: View VMs from the environment in vRSLCM you want to delete

request.description:
https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/lcops/api/environments/{{TheNameOFYourEnvironment}}I/delete
Look up all the VMs which make out the environment you want to delete
Authorization is basic authentication
username: admin@local
password: your vRSLCM password

https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/lcops/api/environments/{{TheNameOFYourEnvironment}}/delete

content type = json application (to delete the VMs from vCenter)
Authorization is basic authentication
username: admin@local
password: your vRSLCM password

item.name: Create vrops wildcard certificate in vRSLCM

request.description:
PUT https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/locker/api/certificates/{{yourvalue}}

Replace{{yourvalue}} in the API call with what you want your certificate to be called. The same goes for the next 2 values. 
Authorization is basic authentication
    username: admin@local
    password: your vRSLCM password
    MODIFY the content of the body (JSON)
transactionid = {{yourvalue}} (enter something up that will go here)
vmid = {{yourvalue}} (enter something up that will go here)
validity = {{number of days}}
ip = can be blank
host = can be a wildcard entry such as {{*.domain}}

item.name: Deploy a single node vROps server

body.raw:
{
      "environmentId":"{{YourValue}}",
      "environmentName":"{{YourValue}}",
      "infrastructure":{
         "properties":{
            "dataCenterName":"DC",
            "regionName":"default",
            "zoneName":"default",
            "vCenterName":"{{YourvCenterFQDN}}",
            "vCenterHost":"{{YourvCenterFQDN}}",
            "vcUsername":"administrator@vsphere.local",
            "vcPassword":"{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfVCPasswordInLocker}}",
            "acceptEULA":"true",
            "enableTelemetry":"false",
            "adminEmail":"{{YourEmail}}",
            "defaultPassword":"{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfDefaultPasswordInLocker}}",
            "certificate":"{{locker:certificate:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:Certificate}}",
            "cluster":"{{YourCluster as in DC#Clusterl}}",
            "storage":"{{YourDatastorel}}",
            "diskMode":"thin",
            "folderName":"{{YourFolder as found by using PowerCLI such as folder-group-v4 }}",
            "resourcePool":"{{YourResourcePool as found by using PowerCLI such as ResourcePool-resgroup-32 }}",
            "network":"{{YourNetwork }}",
            "masterVidmEnabled":"true",
            "dns":"x.x.x.x",
            "domain":"{{YourDomain}}",
            "gateway":"x.x.x.x",
            "netmask":"255.255.255.0",
            "searchpath":"{{YourDomain}}",
            "timeSyncMode":"ntp",
            "ntp":"x.x.x.x",
            "isDhcp":"false"
         }
      },
      "products":[
         {
            "id":"vrops",
            "version":"8.1.0",
            "properties":{
               "certificate":"{{locker:certificate:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:YourvROPsCertificateName}}",
               "productPassword":"{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfDefaultPasswordInLocker}}",
               "licenseRef":"{{locker:license:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfvROpsLicenseInLocker}}",
               "disableTls":"TLSv1",
               "timeSyncMode":"ntp",
               "ntp":"x.x.x.x",
               "affinityRule":false,
               "configureAffinitySeparateAll":"true",
               "deployOption":"small"
            },
            "clusterVIP":{
               "clusterVips":[
 
               ]
            },
            "nodes":[
               {
                  "type":"master",
                  "properties":{
                     "vmName":"{{YourValue}}",
                     "hostName":"{{YourvROps.domain}}",
                     "ip":"x.x.x.x"
                  }
               }
            ]
         }
      ]
   }

request.description:
https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/lcops/api/environments/create

Create a new vROps single node using an existing certificate.
Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
Look for the resourcepool and foldername using powerCLI:
get-resourcepool -name resourcepool | get-view
get folder name -name folder | get-view
MODIFY the BODY (JSON) 
vCenterPassWord: get the vmid of the Pssword for vCenter from the Locker (see General API Calls)
defaultPassWord: get the vmid of the default Password from the Locker (see General API Calls)
certificate: get the vmid of the certificate from the Locker (see General API Calls)

item.name: Deploy a 2 node  vROps cluster and VIP

request.description:
https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/lcops/api/environments/create
API documentation: https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/api/swagger-ui.html
Create a 2 node vROps cluster and VIP. 
Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
PREREQUISTES:
1. Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
2. Look for the resourcepool an foldername using powershell:
    get-resourcepool -name resourcepool | get-view
    get folder name -name folde | get-view
MODIFY the BODY (JSON) 
vCenterPassWord: get the vmid of the Pssword for vCenter from the Locker (see General API Calls)
defaultPassWord: get the vmid of the default Password from the Locker (see General API Calls)
certificate: get the vmid of the certificate from the Locker (see General API Calls)

item.name: Create vrni wildcard certificate in vRSLCM

request.description:
PUT https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/locker/api/certificates/{{yourvalue}}

Replace{{yourvalue}} in the API call with what you want your certificate to be called. The same goes for the next 2 values. 
Authorization is basic authentication
    username: admin@local
    password: your vRSLCM password
    MODIFY the content of the body (JSON)
transactionid = {{yourvalue}} (enter something up that will go here)
vmid = {{yourvalue}} (enter something up that will go here)
validity = {{number of days}}
ip = can be blank
host = can be a wildcard entry such as {{*.domain}}

item.name: Deploy a medium sized vRNI environment in vRSLCM

body.raw:
{
  "environmentId": "{{YourValue}}",
  "environmentName": "{{YourValue}}",
  "environmentHealth": "",
  "logHistory": "",
  "envStatus": null,
  "infrastructure": {
    "properties": {
      "cluster": "{{YourCluster as in DC#Clusterl}}",
      "dns": "x.x.x.x",
      "certificate": "{{locker:certificate:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:vRNICertificate}}",
      "diskMode": "thin",
      "vCenterHost": "{{YourvCenterFQDN}}",
      "dataCenterName": "Default_datacenter",
      "storage": "{{YourDatastore}}",
      "ntp": "x.x.x.x",
      "vCenterName": "Default_vcenter",
      "network": "{{YourNetwork}}",
      "masterVidmEnabled": "true",
      "netmask": "255.255.255.0",
      "vcUsername": "administrator@vsphere.local",
      "domain": "{{YourDomain}}",
      "enableTelemetry": "false",
      "folderName": "",
      "acceptEULA": "true",
      "vcPassword": "{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfVCPasswordInLocker}}",
      "gateway": "x.x.x.x",
      "searchpath": "{{YourDomain}}",
      "defaultPassword": "{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfDefaultPasswordInLocker}}",
      "resourcePool": "",
      "adminEmail": "{{YourEmail}}"
    }
  },
  "products": [
    {
      "id": "vrni",
      "version": "5.2.0",
      "patchHistory": "",
      "snapshotHistory": "",
      "logHistory": "",
      "clusterVIP": {
        "clusterVips": []
      },
      "nodes": [
        {
          "type": "vrni-platform",
          "properties": {
            "cluster": "{{YourCluster as in DC#Clusterl}}",
            "vmName": "{{YourVMName}}",
            "ip": "x.x.x.x",
            "dns": "x.x.x.x",
            "diskMode": "thin",
            "vCenterHost": "{{YourvCenter}}",
            "storage": "{{YourDatastore}}",
            "network": "{{YourNetwork}}",
            "contentLibraryItemId": "",
            "netmask": "255.255.255.0",
            "vcUsername": "administrator@vsphere.local",
            "domain": "{{YourDomain}}",
            "folderName": "",
            "vcPassword": "{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfVCPasswordInLocker}}",
            "vrniNodeSize": "medium",
            "gateway": "x.x.x.x",
            "searchpath": "{{YourDomain}}",
            "resourcePool": ""
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "vrni-collector",
          "properties": {
            "cluster": "{{YourCluster as in DC#Clusterl}}",
            "vmName": "{{YourVMName}}",
            "ip": "x.x.x.x",
            "dns": "x.x.x.x",
            "diskMode": "thin",
            "vCenterHost": "{{YourvCenter}}",
            "storage": "{{YourDatastore}}",
            "network": "{{YourNetwork}}",
            "contentLibraryItemId": "",
            "netmask": "255.255.255.0",
            "vcUsername": "administrator@vsphere.local",
            "domain": "{{YourDomain}}",
            "folderName": "",
            "vcPassword": "{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfVCPasswordInLocker}}",
            "vrniNodeSize": "medium",
            "gateway": "x.x.x.x",
            "searchpath": "{{YourDomain}}",
            "resourcePool": ""
          }
        }
      ],
      "properties": {
        "certificate": "{{locker:certificate:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfvRNICertificateInLocker}}",
        "contentLibraryItemId:platform": "",
        "contentLibraryItemId:proxy": "",
        "productPassword": "{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfDefaultPasswordInLocker}}",
        "licenseRef": "{{locker:license:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfvRNILicenseInLocker}}",
        "ntp": "x.x.x.x",
        "affinityRule": "false",
        "configureAffinitySeparateAll": "true",
        "masterVidmEnabled": "true",
        "vrniPlatformUserName": "admin@local",
        "vrniPlatformPassword": "{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfInstallerPasswordInLocker}}",
        "masterVidmHostName": "{{YourvIDM.domain}}",
        "clientId": "{{YourvRNICLientID}}",
        "clientSecret": "{{YourEnvironmentSecret}}"
              }
              }
  ]
}

request.description:
https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/lcops/api/environments/create
API documentation: https://vrslcm81.vmusketeers.local/api/swagger-ui.html
Create a new vRNI deployment. 
Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
PREREQUISTES:
1. Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
2. Look for the resourcepool an foldername using powershell:
    get-resourcepool -name resourcepool | get-view
    get folder name -name folde | get-view
MODIFY the BODY (JSON) 
vCenterPassWord: get the vmid of the Pssword for vCenter from the Locker (see General API Calls)
defaultPassWord: get the vmid of the default Password from the Locker (see General API Calls)
certificate: get the vmid of the certificate from the Locker (see General API Calls)

transactionid = {{yourvalue}} (enter something up that will go here)

item.name: Deploy a single node vRLI server

body.raw:
{
      "environmentId":"{{YourValue}}",
      "environmentName":"{{YourValue}}",
      "infrastructure":{
         "properties":{
            "dataCenterName":"DC",
            "regionName":"default",
            "zoneName":"default",
            "vCenterName":"{{YourvCenterFQDN}}",
            "vCenterHost":"{{YourvCenterFQDN}}",
            "vcUsername":"administrator@vsphere.local",
            "vcPassword":"{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfVCPasswordInLocker}}",
            "acceptEULA":"true",
            "enableTelemetry":"false",
            "adminEmail":"{{YourEmail}}",
            "defaultPassword":"{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfDefaultPasswordInLocker}}",
            "certificate":"{{locker:certificate:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:Certificate}}",
            "cluster":"{{YourCluster as in DC#Clusterl}}",
            "storage":"{{YourDatastorel}}",
            "diskMode":"thin",
            "folderName":"{{YourFolder as found by using PowerCLI such as folder-group-v4 }}",
            "resourcePool":"{{YourResourcePool as found by using PowerCLI such as ResourcePool-resgroup-32 }}",
            "network":"{{YourNetwork }}",
            "masterVidmEnabled":"true",
            "dns":"x.x.x.x",
            "domain":"{{YourDomain}}",
            "gateway":"x.x.x.x",
            "netmask":"255.255.255.0",
            "searchpath":"{{YourDomain}}",
            "timeSyncMode":"ntp",
            "ntp":"x.x.x.x",
            "isDhcp":"false"
         }
      },
      "products":[
         {
            "id":"vrli",
            "version":"8.1.0",
			"patchHistory": null,
            "snapshotHistory": null,
            "logHistory": null,
            "properties":{
               "certificate":"{{locker:certificate:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:vRLICertificate}}",
               "productPassword":"{{locker:password:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfDefaultPasswordInLocker}}",
               "licenseRef":"{{locker:license:xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx:NameOfvRLILicenseInLocker}}",
               "timeSyncMode":"ntp",
               "ntp":"x.x.x.x",
               "affinityRule":false,
               "configureAffinitySeparateAll":"true",
               "deployOption":"small"
            },
            "clusterVIP":{
               "clusterVips":[
 
               ]
            },
            "nodes":[
               {
                  "type":"vrli-master",
                  "properties":{
                     "vmName":"{{YourVMName}}",
                     "hostName":"{{YourVMName.Domain}}",
                     "ip":"x.x.x.x"
                  }
               }
            ]
         }
      ]
   }
}

request.description:
https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/lcops/api/environments/create
API documentation: https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/api/swagger-ui.html
Create a new single node vRLI deployment. 
Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
PREREQUISTES:
1. Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
2. Look for the resourcepool an foldername using powershell:
    get-resourcepool -name resourcepool | get-view
    get folder name -name folde | get-view
MODIFY the BODY (JSON) 
vCenterPassWord: get the vmid of the Pssword for vCenter from the Locker (see General API Calls)
defaultPassWord: get the vmid of the default Password from the Locker (see General API Calls)
certificate: get the vmid of the certificate from the Locker (see General API Calls)

https://{{your-vrslcm-fqdn}}/lcm/lcops/api/environments/create

Deploy a 3 node vRLI cluster. 
Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
PREREQUISTES:
1. Datacentername = name of datacenter in vSphere UI
2. Look for the resourcepool an foldername using powershell:
